t:
My daughter died TWICE.

Once when she was brutally raped and murdered.


Again when the court gave the rapist just 7 years in prison,
cause the defense argued, otherwise
     'his life will be destroyed for few
                  minutes of fun'.
c:
Based on a true story.

True around the world.



#realhorror #truestory #rape #murder #injustice #death #crime #twist
